Title:
Taxonomic and Phylogenetic analysis of Clinoconidium
lauracearum (Cryptobasidiaceae) producing galls on fruits of Cinnamomum
tamala (Lauraceae) in India
Abstract:
Clinoconidium lauracearum is described and illustrated as
a new species which was found as a parasitic smut on fruits of an
economically important forest tree Cinnamomum tamala. Morpholofgical and
molecular studies confirmed it as Clinoconidium lauracearum. A
literature based checklist of Clinoconidium species with their
respective hosts along with geographic locations is also provided.
